alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Shiawassee County through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Lansing, or 7 miles northeast of Lansing, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Laingsburg around 600 PM EDT. Perry around 605 PM EDT. Morrice around 610 PM EDT. Owosso around 625 PM EDT. Corunna and Henderson around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Juddville, Bennington, Shaftsburg, Carland and Vernon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
